document.full_text: prince will continue his residency-style "welcome 2 america" tour with a whopping 21-date stand in los angeles, beginning on april 14 at the forum. the artist made the announcement via a phone call on george lopez's show thursday night.
document.title: prince to play 21-night residency in los angeles
lines_and_colors: prince will continue his residency-style "welcome 2 america" tour with a whopping 21-date stand in los angeles, beginning on april 14 at the forum. the artist made the announcement via a phone call on george lopez's show thursday night.
